<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete inventory items by IDs"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/inventory/items/ids"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Deletes multiple inventory catalog items by their unique identifiers.

**Note**: This API is marked as deprecated (v1.0). Use this for targeted deletion of specific items.

**Prerequisites**:
- **InventoryItemIds**: Use [POST /api/v1.0/inventory/items/query](/docs/api/inventory/query-inventory-items) to find item IDs to delete.

**Workflow**:
1. Query the catalog to identify items to delete
2. Extract `InventoryItemId` values from the response
3. Submit the array of IDs to this endpoint

**Caution**: This performs a soft delete. Items with active stock may be restricted from deletion. Verify associated stock is cleared first.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"description":"Array of inventory item IDs to delete.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},"example":["2b0e2cb0-4cb5-4b0f-9a7d-2c9f2ac830d2","3c1f3dc1-5dc6-5c10-0b8e-3d003bd941e3"]}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Inventory items deleted successfully.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response envelope for deleting multiple inventory catalog items.","allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Response envelope returned after successfully deleting multiple resources in bulk. >
  
</StatusCodes>
